summary: The Spaceport Project Opportunities for Resilient Transportation Act (SPACEPORT Act) amends Chapter 511 of Title 51 of the United States Code to modernize space transportation infrastructure grants. It redefines "public agency," modifies grant limitations, updates eligibility criteria to reflect civil, national security, and commercial space transportation needs, and mandates a report to Congress on space transportation demand and infrastructure. The bill also changes the authorization of appropriations and incorporates technical amendments to the chapter heading and table of chapters.
